thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Customer- kildare
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Customer- kildare

author: Customer- kildare
title: Customer- kildare
text: Online is quick and easy with next day delivery I got my parcel within 22hrs of ordering, it's the little things like the way my item was gift wrapped in Mc Elhinneys paper and nicely folded and packed into package (not just shoved into a plastic bag). it's hard to get that kind of care and pride within online retail these days... it's actually my new go to for online shopping.
